Returns the minimum expected output amount for a token trade, given an input amount

info.title: Player API
info.description: The Player API is a service to integrate your game with Beam

tags.name: Assets
tags.description: Retrieve assets (ERC-20, ERC-721 and ERC1155) for profiles in your game

tags.name: Transactions
tags.description: Retrieve and create transactions on behalf of the profiles in your game

tags.name: Marketplace
tags.description: Manage listings and buy assets through the Beam marketplace

tags.name: Operation
tags.description: Used by Game SDKs to propagate transaction results like signing, sessions etc.

tags.name: Exchange
tags.description: Convert tokens using an exchange for users in your game

tags.name: Users
tags.description: Retrieve and manage users in Beam

tags.name: Activity
tags.description: Retrieve activity for the users and tokens in your game

tags.name: Stats
tags.description: Retrieve stats for the assets in your game

operationProcessing.description: Operation processing type. If Execute is used, Operation will be executed automatically right after User signs it. If you prefer to have more control, use SignOnly then Process it using ProcessOperation.

authProvider.description: Auth Provider for the user to use. If it's Any, user will be able to choose his preferred login method. Useful when you want to present social login choice in your UI.

transactions.description: Legacy transactions property. Please deprecate the usage and move to the OperationResponse.Actions[] array instead.
